 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָגַל‎</span> **verb denominative** ==foot it, go about==; — 

**Qal** ***go about*** (maliciously, ***as slanderer***; compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> and <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***slanderer***, from √ √ <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***wallk along***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***walk quickly), slander, Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַללֿשֹׁנוֺ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לאֹרֿ‎</span> [[Ps.15.3|Ps 15:3]], ***he talks no slander upon his tongue*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דֹּבֵר אֱמֶת‎</span> v[[Ps.15.2|Ps 15:2]]). **Pi\`el*****Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְרַגֵּל‎</span> [[2Sam.19.28|2Sam 19:28]], 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְרַגְּלוּ‎</span> [[Deut.1.24|Deut 1:24]]; [[Josh.7.2|Josh 7:2]] ***Imperative*** masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַגְּלוּ‎</span> [[Josh.7.2|Josh 7:2]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְרֵגֵּל‎</span> [[Num.21.32|Num 21:32]] + 5 t.; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְרַגְּלָהּ‎</span> [[2Sam.10.3|2Sam 10:3]] ***Participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְרַגְּלִים‎</span> [[Gen.42.9|Gen 42:9]] + 11 t.; — 

**1.** ***slander*** (compare **Qal**), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּעַבְדְךָ אֶל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְר‎</span> [[2Sam.19.28|2Sam 19:28]]. 

**2.** ***go about as explorer, spy***, with accusative of location [[Num.21.32|Num 21:32]]; [[Josh.6.25|Josh 6:25]]; [[Josh.7.2|Josh 7:2]] (twice in verse); [[Josh.14.7|Josh 14:7]] (all [[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]]), [[Judg.18.2|Judg 18:2]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָקַר‎</span>), v[[Judg.18.14|Judg 18:14]] v[[Judg.18.17|Judg 18:17]]; [[2Sam.10.3|2Sam 10:3]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָקַר‎</span>), [[1Chr.19.3|1Chr 19:3]], so also participle [[Gen.42.30|Gen 42:30]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Josh.6.22|Josh 6:22]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]); participle, accusative omitted, as adjective, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲנָשִׁים מְרַגְּלִים‎</span> [[Josh.2.1|Josh 2:1]], compare [[Josh.6.23|Josh 6:23]] (both [[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]]); as substantive, ***spies*** [[1Sam.26.4|1Sam 26:4]]; [[2Sam.15.10|2Sam 15:10]], and so perhaps (as predicate) [[Gen.42.9|Gen 42:9]]; [[Gen.42.11|Gen 42:11]]; [[Gen.42.14|Gen 42:14]]; [[Gen.42.16|Gen 42:16]]; [[Gen.42.31|Gen 42:31]]; [[Gen.42.34|Gen 42:34]] (all [[BDB#E|E]]). **Tiph\`el**, ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּרְגַּלְתִּי לְאֶפְרַיִם‎</span> [[Hos.11.3|Hos 11:3]] ***I taught*** Ephraim ***to walk*** (si vera 1.; see [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:55h»§ 55h</sup>).
